short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hard refreshes all open tabs in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Refresh Active or All Tabs is a must-have Chrome extension that simplifies the process of updating multiple tabs simultaneously. With Refresh All Tabs, you can effortlessly refresh all open tabs in your browser with just a single click, ensuring that you're always viewing the latest content across all websites. Whether you're a developer testing changes on multiple pages or a user wanting to ensure you're up-to-date with the latest news and information, Refresh All Tabs makes it quick and easy to refresh every tab in your browser in one go.

Features:

One-click tab refreshing: Refresh all open tabs in Chrome with a single click.
Time-saving convenience: Avoid the hassle of manually refreshing each tab individually.
Streamlined workflow: Boost productivity by quickly updating multiple tabs at once.
Developer-friendly: Ideal for developers testing changes across multiple webpages simultaneously.
User-friendly: Simple and intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to use.
Stay Up-to-Date, Stay Informed:
With Refresh All Tabs, you're empowered to stay ahead of the curve and access the latest content across all your favorite websites. Say goodbye to outdated information and hello to a browsing experience that's always up-to-date and in sync with the latest changes online
